author: SwarfegaGit
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
Get-ComputerInfo
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

To not crash?


Actual behavior
---------------

[Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/dOQPSQa.png)

Environment data
----------------

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta.8
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.8
OS                             Microsoft Windows 6.1.7601 S
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```
title: Get-ComputerInfo crashes on Windows 7 x64
